typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		StgClaim_providerXref as string,
		providerName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT       \n       ltrim(rtrim([providerXref])) as StgClaim_providerXref\n      ,[providerName]\nFROM dbo.[Stg_Claim]',
	format: 'query') ~> StgClaim
source(output(
		ProviderID as integer,
		ProviderXRef as string,
		ProviderFullName as string,
		Hashcolumn as binary
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT\n       [ProviderID]\n      ,ltrim(rtrim([ProviderXRef])) As ProviderXRef\n      ,[ProviderFullName]\n      ,[Hashcolumn]\n  FROM [dbo].[DimProvider]',
	format: 'query') ~> srcDimProvider
HashBuild, srcDimProvider join(StgClaim_providerXref == ProviderXRef,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
ConditionalSplitForErroneousRecs@ValidRecs derive(Hash = toBinary(md5(StgClaim_providerXref+providerName))) ~> HashBuild
Join split(isNull(ProviderXRef),
	isNull(ProviderXRef) && notEquals(Hashcolumn, Hash),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(New, Updates)
ConditionalSplit@Updates alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateEssentials
StgClaim split(isNull(toString(StgClaim_providerXref)) || isNull(toString(providerName)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitForErroneousRecs@(InvalidRecs, ValidRecs)
ConditionalSplit@New sink(input(
		ProviderID as integer,
		ProviderXRef as string,
		ProviderFullName as string,
		Hashcolumn as binary,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProviderXRef,
		ProviderFullName,
		Hashcolumn = Hash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false) ~> InsertRecs
UpdateEssentials sink(input(
		ProviderID as integer,
		ProviderXRef as string,
		ProviderFullName as string,
		Hashcolumn as binary,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ProviderXRef'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProviderXRef,
		ProviderFullName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false) ~> UpdateRecs
ConditionalSplitForErroneousRecs@InvalidRecs sink(input(
		SrNo as integer,
		ProviderXRef as string,
		ProviderFullName as string,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProviderXRef = StgClaim_providerXref,
		ProviderFullName = providerName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> InvalidRecsForDimProvider
